enum Month {
	case january // 1
  case february // 2
  case march // 3
  case april // 4
  case may // 5
  case june // 6
  case july // 7
  case august // 8
  case september // 9
  case october // 10
  case november // 11
  case december // 12
}

enum Month: Int {
	case january = 1
  case february = 2
  case march = 3
  case april = 4
  case may = 5
  case june = 6
  case july = 7
  case august = 8
  case september = 9
  case october = 10
  case november = 11
  case december = 12
}

enum ItalianFood {
	case pizza(dough: String, topping: String)
	case pasta(diameter: Int, boilingTime: Int, shape: ShapeOfPasta)
	case lasagna(fillings: String)
